word_placement.blank_tiles_must_be_assigned_letters: Blank tiles must be assigned letters.
word_placement.non_blank_tiles_cannot_be_assigned_lette: Non-blank tiles cannot be assigned letters.
word_placement.tiles_not_in_line: Tiles are not in a line.
word_placement.line_with_gaps: Tiles form a line with gaps between them.
word_placement.must_connect_to_existing: Tiles must connect to existing words or cover the center square.

url.tn_not_a_number: "tn" param is not a turn number: "${param}"
url.both_word_and_exchange: Found both word and exchange data for turn ${turnNumber}.
url.duplicate_bt_index: Duplicate blank tile assignment index: bt=${param}
url.bt_index_out_of_range: Blank tile assignment index out of range: no "${word}"[${index}].
url.word_out_of_bounds: Attempted to play a word out of bounds: ${row},${col}.
url.wrong_letter: Word requires "${requiredLetter}" at ${row},${col}, but "${actualLetter}" is there.
url.invalid_letter: Attempt to play an invalid letter: "${letter}"
url.bt_index_range: "bt" parameter has index ${index} out of range 0-${maxIndex}.
url.incomplete_turn_data: Incomplete data for turn ${turnNumber}: wl=${wl} ${direction}=${word} bt=${bt}
url.invalid_player_id: Invalid turn URL: Player ID "${id}" should be in 1-${maxId}.
